casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Calvin CHANDLER 189A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 27, 2019

Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Chandler, Kenneth Calvin

G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law

Jennifer T. Harrod, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For State of North Carolina

Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina *98The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 27th of August 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of August 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 3rd day of October 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
